title.jp: Mondai ga Aru Hitotachi / Sayonara Uchimaki-kun

synopsis: Uzumaki Subaru joins the Art Club with Usami Mizuki. Mizuki has a crush on Subaru, but he's only interested in 2D girls.

title.jp: Maigo no Love Letter Satsujin Jiken / Ii Ko Warui Ko Maigo no Ko / Love Letter Panic

synopsis: The President is dead, but not from bleeding to death, as it first appears. He's dead because the puddle of "blood" he's in is actually red paint that he'd gotten on Mizuki's painting.

title.jp: Sagashimono wa Doko e Itta? / Short Bob / Kansetsu Kiss

synopsis: Colette can't find her rocket -- err, locket. Subaru's new waifu could end up being a bald guy named Bob. Mizuki's friends can't stop teasing her about Subaru, so they follow her to the art club room.

title.jp: Bijutsubu e Youkoso / Colle Sanpo / Sukoshizutsu, Chottozutsu

synopsis: Tachibana-sensei is the new, fearful advisory teacher for the Art Club. Colette goes for a walk, putting herself at risk of being melted by the day star. Subaru offers to bring Mizuki's print-outs to her.

title.jp: Kanchigai Train / Hato to Ningyo to Pool-souji

synopsis: Colette gives a plaster head a tan, setting in motion a chain of unlikely misunderstandings. Colette becomes a bird.

title.jp: Nazo no Bishoujo Tenkousei / Kininaru Futari

synopsis: Subaru has a new classmate. Even though she's super pretty, Mizuki isn't too concerned, because he isn't interested in 3D girls. But this one girl knows what to say to get his attention.

title.jp: Hajimete no Kyoudou Sagyou...? / Master Imari

synopsis: Uchimaki and Usami enter the art competition, encouraged by Yumeko-sensei and a new rival. Colette plans for her future, but Usami doesn't take her seriously.

title.jp: Himitsu no Heya / Let's Tresure Hunt!

synopsis: Subaru and Mizuki get themselves locked inside a storage room. Help was on its way, but it was Yumeko-sensei. Subaru and Maria discover directions to a treasure left by previous members of the Art Club.

title.jp: Madousho wo Oe! / Chousensha Futatabi / Moe Sanpo

synopsis: Subaru and the president are on a mission to preserve their dangerous book. Subaru's challenger returns for a rematch. The president takes Moeka on a tour around school.

title.jp: Omoide no Turquoise Blue / Usami Juku / Buster Kaori
